com.ning.billing.overdue

Interface Condition<T extends Blockable>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultCondition

    public interface Condition<T extends Blockable>

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean evaluate(BillingState<T> state, org.joda.time.LocalDate now)
      Evaluate the condition in a given state, at a given date.

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        boolean evaluate(BillingState<T> state,
               org.joda.time.LocalDate now)
        Evaluate the condition in a given state, at a given date.
        Parameters:
        state - the billing state
        now - the day to use to evaluate the condition, in the account timezone
        Returns:
        true if the condition is true, false otherwise
